00104 /*********************** Make Vertex Parent Operator ************************/

00106 static int vertex_parent_set_poll(bContext *C)
00107 {
00108     return ED_operator_editmesh(C) || ED_operator_editsurfcurve(C) || ED_operator_editlattice(C);
00109 }
00110 
00111 static int vertex_parent_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00112 {
00113     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00114     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00115     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00116     BMVert *eve;
00117     BMIter iter;
00118     Curve *cu;
00119     Nurb *nu;
00120     BezTriple *bezt;
00121     BPoint *bp;
00122     Object *par;
00123     int a, v1=0, v2=0, v3=0, v4=0, nr=1;
00124     
00125     /* we need 1 to 3 selected vertices */
00126     
00127     if (obedit->type==OB_MESH) {
00128         Mesh *me= obedit->data;
00129         BMEditMesh *em;
00130 
00131         EDBM_mesh_load(obedit);
00132         EDBM_mesh_make(scene->toolsettings, scene, obedit);
00133 
00134         em= me->edit_btmesh;
00135 
00136         /* derivedMesh might be needed for solving parenting,
00137          * so re-create it here */
00138         makeDerivedMesh(scene, obedit, em, CD_MASK_BAREMESH, 0);
00139 
00140         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00141             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00142                 if (v1==0) v1= nr;
00143                 else if (v2==0) v2= nr;
00144                 else if (v3==0) v3= nr;
00145                 else if (v4==0) v4= nr;
00146                 else break;
00147             }
00148             nr++;
00149         }
00150     }
00151     else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE)) {
00152         ListBase *editnurb= object_editcurve_get(obedit);
00153         
00154         cu= obedit->data;
00155 
00156         nu= editnurb->first;
00157         while (nu) {
00158             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00159                 bezt= nu->bezt;
00160                 a= nu->pntsu;
00161                 while (a--) {
00162                     if (BEZSELECTED_HIDDENHANDLES(cu, bezt)) {
00163                         if (v1==0) v1= nr;
00164                         else if (v2==0) v2= nr;
00165                         else if (v3==0) v3= nr;
00166                         else if (v4==0) v4= nr;
00167                         else break;
00168                     }
00169                     nr++;
00170                     bezt++;
00171                 }
00172             }
00173             else {
00174                 bp= nu->bp;
00175                 a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
00176                 while (a--) {
00177                     if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00178                         if (v1==0) v1= nr;
00179                         else if (v2==0) v2= nr;
00180                         else if (v3==0) v3= nr;
00181                         else if (v4==0) v4= nr;
00182                         else break;
00183                     }
00184                     nr++;
00185                     bp++;
00186                 }
00187             }
00188             nu= nu->next;
00189         }
00190     }
00191     else if (obedit->type==OB_LATTICE) {
00192         Lattice *lt= obedit->data;
00193         
00194         a= lt->editlatt->latt->pntsu*lt->editlatt->latt->pntsv*lt->editlatt->latt->pntsw;
00195         bp= lt->editlatt->latt->def;
00196         while (a--) {
00197             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00198                 if (v1==0) v1= nr;
00199                 else if (v2==0) v2= nr;
00200                 else if (v3==0) v3= nr;
00201                 else if (v4==0) v4= nr;
00202                 else break;
00203             }
00204             nr++;
00205             bp++;
00206         }
00207     }
00208     
00209     if (v4 || !((v1 && v2==0 && v3==0) || (v1 && v2 && v3)) ) {
00210         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Select either 1 or 3 vertices to parent to");
00211         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00212     }
00213     
00214     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00215         if (ob != obedit) {
00216             ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00217             par= obedit->parent;
00218             
00219             while (par) {
00220                 if (par==ob) break;
00221                 par= par->parent;
00222             }
00223             if (par) {
00224                 BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Loop in parents");
00225             }
00226             else {
00227                 Object workob;
00228                 
00229                 ob->parent= BASACT->object;
00230                 if (v3) {
00231                     ob->partype= PARVERT3;
00232                     ob->par1= v1-1;
00233                     ob->par2= v2-1;
00234                     ob->par3= v3-1;
00235 
00236                     /* inverse parent matrix */
00237                     what_does_parent(scene, ob, &workob);
00238                     invert_m4_m4(ob->parentinv, workob.obmat);
00239                 }
00240                 else {
00241                     ob->partype= PARVERT1;
00242                     ob->par1= v1-1;
00243 
00244                     /* inverse parent matrix */
00245                     what_does_parent(scene, ob, &workob);
00246                     invert_m4_m4(ob->parentinv, workob.obmat);
00247                 }
00248             }
00249         }
00250     }
00251     CTX_DATA_END;
00252     
00253     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00254 
00255     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT, NULL);
00256 
00257     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00258 }

00260 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_parent_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
00261 {
00262     /* identifiers */
00263     ot->name = "Make Vertex Parent";
00264     ot->description = "Parent selected objects to the selected vertices";
00265     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_parent_set";
00266     
00267     /* api callbacks */
00268     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm;
00269     ot->poll = vertex_parent_set_poll;
00270     ot->exec = vertex_parent_set_exec;
00271     
00272     /* flags */
00273     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00274 }

00276 /********************** Make Proxy Operator *************************/
00277 
00278 /* set the object to proxify */
00279 static int make_proxy_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00280 {
00281     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00282     Object *ob= ED_object_active_context(C);
00283     
00284     /* sanity checks */
00285     if (!scene || scene->id.lib || !ob)
00286         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00287         
00288     /* Get object to work on - use a menu if we need to... */
00289     if (ob->dup_group && ob->dup_group->id.lib) {
00290         /* gives menu with list of objects in group */
00291         //proxy_group_objects_menu(C, op, ob, ob->dup_group);
00292         WM_enum_search_invoke(C, op, evt);
00293         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00294 
00295     }
00296     else if (ob->id.lib) {
00297         uiPopupMenu *pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, "OK?", ICON_QUESTION);
00298         uiLayout *layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00299         
00300         /* create operator menu item with relevant properties filled in */
00301         uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, op->type, op->type->name, ICON_NONE, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
00302         
00303         /* present the menu and be done... */
00304         uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00305     }
00306     else {
00307         /* error.. cannot continue */
00308         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can only make proxy for a referenced object or group");
00309     }
00310     
00311     /* this invoke just calls another instance of this operator... */
00312     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00313 }
00314 
00315 static int make_proxy_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00316 {
00317     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00318     Object *ob, *gob= ED_object_active_context(C);
00319     GroupObject *go;
00320     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00321 
00322     if (gob->dup_group != NULL) {
00323         go= BLI_findlink(&gob->dup_group->gobject, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "object"));
00324         ob= go->ob;
00325     }
00326     else {
00327         ob= gob;
00328         gob = NULL;
00329     }
00330     
00331     if (ob) {
00332         Object *newob;
00333         Base *newbase, *oldbase= BASACT;
00334         char name[MAX_ID_NAME+4];
00335         
00336         /* Add new object for the proxy */
00337         newob= add_object(scene, OB_EMPTY);
00338 
00339         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s_proxy", ((ID *)(gob ? gob : ob))->name+2);
00340 
00341         rename_id(&newob->id, name);
00342         
00343         /* set layers OK */
00344         newbase= BASACT;    /* add_object sets active... */
00345         newbase->lay= oldbase->lay;
00346         newob->lay= newbase->lay;
00347         
00348         /* remove base, leave user count of object, it gets linked in object_make_proxy */
00349         if (gob==NULL) {
00350             BLI_remlink(&scene->base, oldbase);
00351             MEM_freeN(oldbase);
00352         }
00353         
00354         object_make_proxy(newob, ob, gob);
00355         
00356         /* depsgraph flushes are needed for the new data */
00357         DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00358         DAG_id_tag_update(&newob->id, OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME);
00359         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, newob);
00360     }
00361     else {
00362         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No object to make proxy for");
00363         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00364     }
00365     
00366     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00367 }
00368 
00369 /* Generic itemf's for operators that take library args */
00370 static EnumPropertyItem *proxy_group_object_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *free)
00371 {
00372     EnumPropertyItem item_tmp= {0}, *item= NULL;
00373     int totitem= 0;
00374     int i= 0;
00375     Object *ob= ED_object_active_context(C);
00376     GroupObject *go;
00377 
00378     if (!ob || !ob->dup_group)
00379         return DummyRNA_DEFAULT_items;
00380 
00381     /* find the object to affect */
00382     for (go= ob->dup_group->gobject.first; go; go= go->next) {
00383         item_tmp.identifier= item_tmp.name= go->ob->id.name+2;
00384         item_tmp.value= i++;
00385         RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &item_tmp);
00386     }
00387 
00388     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
00389     *free= 1;
00390 
00391     return item;
00392 }
00393 
00394 void OBJECT_OT_proxy_make (wmOperatorType *ot)
00395 {
00396     PropertyRNA *prop;
00397 
00398     /* identifiers */
00399     ot->name = "Make Proxy";
00400     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_proxy_make";
00401     ot->description = "Add empty object to become local replacement data of a library-linked object";
00402     
00403     /* callbacks */
00404     ot->invoke = make_proxy_invoke;
00405     ot->exec = make_proxy_exec;
00406     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active;
00407     
00408     /* flags */
00409     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00410     
00411     /* properties */
00412     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "object", DummyRNA_DEFAULT_items, 0, "Proxy Object", "Name of lib-linked/grouped object to make a proxy for"); /* XXX, relies on hard coded ID at the moment */
00413     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, proxy_group_object_itemf);
00414     ot->prop = prop;
00415 }

00419 EnumPropertyItem prop_clear_parent_types[] = {
00420     {0, "CLEAR", 0, "Clear Parent", ""},
00421     {1, "CLEAR_KEEP_TRANSFORM", 0, "Clear and Keep Transformation", ""},
00422     {2, "CLEAR_INVERSE", 0, "Clear Parent Inverse", ""},

00425 
00426 void ED_object_parent_clear(bContext *C, int type)
00427 {
00428     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00429     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00430 
00431     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) 
00432     {
00433         if (ob->parent == NULL)
00434             continue;
00435         
00436         if (type == 0) {
00437             ob->parent= NULL;
00438         }
00439         else if (type == 1) {
00440             ob->parent= NULL;
00441             object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat, TRUE, FALSE);
00442         }
00443         else if (type == 2)
00444             unit_m4(ob->parentinv);
00445         
00446         ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00447     }
00448     CTX_DATA_END;
00449 
00450     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00451     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00452     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00453     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARENT, NULL);
00454 }

00459     ED_object_parent_clear(C, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type"));
00460 
00461     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00462 }

00483 /* ******************** Make Parent Operator *********************** */
00484 
00485 void ED_object_parent(Object *ob, Object *par, int type, const char *substr)
00486 {
00487     if (!par || BKE_object_parent_loop_check(par, ob)) {
00488         ob->parent= NULL;
00489         ob->partype= PAROBJECT;
00490         ob->parsubstr[0]= 0;
00491         return;
00492     }
00493 
00494     /* this could use some more checks */
00495 
00496     ob->parent= par;
00497     ob->partype &= ~PARTYPE;
00498     ob->partype |= type;
00499     BLI_strncpy(ob->parsubstr, substr, sizeof(ob->parsubstr));
00500 }
00501 
00502 /* Operator Property */
00503 EnumPropertyItem prop_make_parent_types[] = {
00504     {PAR_OBJECT, "OBJECT", 0, "Object", ""},
00505     {PAR_ARMATURE, "ARMATURE", 0, "Armature Deform", ""},
00506     {PAR_ARMATURE_NAME, "ARMATURE_NAME", 0, "   With Empty Groups", ""},
00507     {PAR_ARMATURE_AUTO, "ARMATURE_AUTO", 0, "   With Automatic Weights", ""},
00508     {PAR_ARMATURE_ENVELOPE, "ARMATURE_ENVELOPE", 0, "   With Envelope Weights", ""},
00509     {PAR_BONE, "BONE", 0, "Bone", ""},
00510     {PAR_CURVE, "CURVE", 0, "Curve Deform", ""},
00511     {PAR_FOLLOW, "FOLLOW", 0, "Follow Path", ""},
00512     {PAR_PATH_CONST, "PATH_CONST", 0, "Path Constraint", ""},
00513     {PAR_LATTICE, "LATTICE", 0, "Lattice Deform", ""},
00514     {PAR_VERTEX, "VERTEX", 0, "Vertex", ""},
00515     {PAR_TRIA, "TRIA", 0, "Triangle", ""},
00516     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00517 };
00518 
00519 int ED_object_parent_set(ReportList *reports, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *ob, Object *par, int partype)
00520 {
00521     bPoseChannel *pchan= NULL;
00522     int pararm= ELEM4(partype, PAR_ARMATURE, PAR_ARMATURE_NAME, PAR_ARMATURE_ENVELOPE, PAR_ARMATURE_AUTO);
00523     
00524     par->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
00525     
00526     /* preconditions */
00527     if (partype==PAR_FOLLOW || partype==PAR_PATH_CONST) {
00528         if (par->type!=OB_CURVE)
00529             return 0;
00530         else {
00531             Curve *cu= par->data;
00532             
00533             if ((cu->flag & CU_PATH)==0) {
00534                 cu->flag |= CU_PATH|CU_FOLLOW;
00535                 makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, par, 0);  /* force creation of path data */
00536             }
00537             else cu->flag |= CU_FOLLOW;
00538             
00539             /* if follow, add F-Curve for ctime (i.e. "eval_time") so that path-follow works */
00540             if (partype == PAR_FOLLOW) {
00541                 /* get or create F-Curve */
00542                 bAction *act = verify_adt_action(&cu->id, 1);
00543                 FCurve *fcu = verify_fcurve(act, NULL, "eval_time", 0, 1);
00544                 
00545                 /* setup dummy 'generator' modifier here to get 1-1 correspondence still working */
00546                 if (!fcu->bezt && !fcu->fpt && !fcu->modifiers.first)
00547                     add_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, FMODIFIER_TYPE_GENERATOR);
00548             }
00549             
00550             /* fall back on regular parenting now (for follow only) */
00551             if (partype == PAR_FOLLOW)
00552                 partype= PAR_OBJECT;
00553         }       
00554     }
00555     else if (partype==PAR_BONE) {
00556         pchan= get_active_posechannel(par);
00557         
00558         if (pchan==NULL) {
00559             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No active Bone");
00560             return 0;
00561         }
00562     }
00563     
00564     if (ob!=par) {
00565         if (BKE_object_parent_loop_check(par, ob)) {
00566             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Loop in parents");
00567             return 0;
00568         }
00569         else {
00570             Object workob;
00571             
00572             /* apply transformation of previous parenting */
00573             /* object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat); */ /* removed because of bug [#23577] */
00574             
00575             /* set the parent (except for follow-path constraint option) */
00576             if (partype != PAR_PATH_CONST) {
00577                 ob->parent= par;
00578             }
00579             
00580             /* handle types */
00581             if (pchan)
00582                 BLI_strncpy(ob->parsubstr, pchan->name, sizeof(ob->parsubstr));
00583             else
00584                 ob->parsubstr[0]= 0;
00585                 
00586             if (partype == PAR_PATH_CONST) {
00587                 /* don't do anything here, since this is not technically "parenting" */
00588             }
00589             else if (ELEM(partype, PAR_CURVE, PAR_LATTICE) || (pararm)) {
00590                 /* partype is now set to PAROBJECT so that invisible 'virtual' modifiers don't need to be created
00591                  * NOTE: the old (2.4x) method was to set ob->partype = PARSKEL, creating the virtual modifiers
00592                  */
00593                 ob->partype= PAROBJECT; /* note, dna define, not operator property */
00594                 //ob->partype= PARSKEL; /* note, dna define, not operator property */
00595                 
00596                 /* BUT, to keep the deforms, we need a modifier, and then we need to set the object that it uses */
00597                 // XXX currently this should only happen for meshes, curves, surfaces, and lattices - this stuff isn't available for metas yet
00598                 if (ELEM5(ob->type, OB_MESH, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT, OB_LATTICE)) {
00599                     ModifierData *md;
00600                     
00601                     switch (partype) {
00602                     case PAR_CURVE: /* curve deform */
00603                         md= ED_object_modifier_add(reports, bmain, scene, ob, NULL, eModifierType_Curve);
00604                         ((CurveModifierData *)md)->object= par;
00605                         break;
00606                     case PAR_LATTICE: /* lattice deform */
00607                         md= ED_object_modifier_add(reports, bmain, scene, ob, NULL, eModifierType_Lattice);
00608                         ((LatticeModifierData *)md)->object= par;
00609                         break;
00610                     default: /* armature deform */
00611                         md= ED_object_modifier_add(reports, bmain, scene, ob, NULL, eModifierType_Armature);
00612                         ((ArmatureModifierData *)md)->object= par;
00613                         break;
00614                     }
00615                 }
00616             }
00617             else if (partype == PAR_BONE)
00618                 ob->partype= PARBONE; /* note, dna define, not operator property */
00619             else
00620                 ob->partype= PAROBJECT; /* note, dna define, not operator property */
00621             
00622             /* constraint */
00623             if (partype == PAR_PATH_CONST) {
00624                 bConstraint *con;
00625                 bFollowPathConstraint *data;
00626                 float cmat[4][4], vec[3];
00627                 
00628                 con = add_ob_constraint(ob, "AutoPath", CONSTRAINT_TYPE_FOLLOWPATH);
00629                 
00630                 data = con->data;
00631                 data->tar = par;
00632                 
00633                 get_constraint_target_matrix(scene, con, 0, CONSTRAINT_OBTYPE_OBJECT, NULL, cmat, scene->r.cfra);
00634                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec, ob->obmat[3], cmat[3]);
00635                 
00636                 ob->loc[0] = vec[0];
00637                 ob->loc[1] = vec[1];
00638                 ob->loc[2] = vec[2];
00639             }
00640             else if (pararm && ob->type==OB_MESH && par->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00641                 if (partype == PAR_ARMATURE_NAME)
00642                     create_vgroups_from_armature(reports, scene, ob, par, ARM_GROUPS_NAME, 0);
00643                 else if (partype == PAR_ARMATURE_ENVELOPE)
00644                     create_vgroups_from_armature(reports, scene, ob, par, ARM_GROUPS_ENVELOPE, 0);
00645                 else if (partype == PAR_ARMATURE_AUTO) {
00646                     WM_cursor_wait(1);
00647                     create_vgroups_from_armature(reports, scene, ob, par, ARM_GROUPS_AUTO, 0);
00648                     WM_cursor_wait(0);
00649                 }
00650                 /* get corrected inverse */
00651                 ob->partype= PAROBJECT;
00652                 what_does_parent(scene, ob, &workob);
00653                 
00654                 invert_m4_m4(ob->parentinv, workob.obmat);
00655             }
00656             else {
00657                 /* calculate inverse parent matrix */
00658                 what_does_parent(scene, ob, &workob);
00659                 invert_m4_m4(ob->parentinv, workob.obmat);
00660             }
00661             
00662             ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA;
00663         }
00664     }
00665 
00666     return 1;
00667 }
00668 
00669 static int parent_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00670 {
00671     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00672     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00673     Object *par= ED_object_active_context(C);
00674     int partype= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00675     int ok = 1;
00676 
00677     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects)
00678     {
00679         if (!ED_object_parent_set(op->reports, bmain, scene, ob, par, partype)) {
00680             ok = 0;
00681             break;
00682         }
00683     }
00684     CTX_DATA_END;
00685 
00686     if (!ok)
00687         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00688 
00689     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00690     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00691     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00692     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARENT, NULL);
00693 
00694     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00695 }
00696 
00697 
00698 static int parent_set_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00699 {
00700     Object *ob= ED_object_active_context(C);
00701     uiPopupMenu *pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, "Set Parent To", ICON_NONE);
00702     uiLayout *layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00703     
00704     uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(layout, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT);
00705     uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_OBJECT);
00706     
00707     /* ob becomes parent, make the associated menus */
00708     if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00709         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_ARMATURE);
00710         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_ARMATURE_NAME);
00711         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_ARMATURE_ENVELOPE);
00712         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_ARMATURE_AUTO);
00713         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_BONE);
00714     }
00715     else if (ob->type==OB_CURVE) {
00716         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_CURVE);
00717         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_FOLLOW);
00718         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_PATH_CONST);
00719     }
00720     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00721         uiItemEnumO(layout, "OBJECT_OT_parent_set", NULL, 0, "type", PAR_LATTICE);
00722     }
00723     
00724     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00725     
00726     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00727 }

00731 {
00732     /* identifiers */
00733     ot->name = "Make Parent";
00734     ot->description = "Set the object's parenting";
00735     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_parent_set";
00736     
00737     /* api callbacks */
00738     ot->invoke = parent_set_invoke;
00739     ot->exec = parent_set_exec;
00740     
00741     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active;
00742     
00743     /* flags */

00745     
00746     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_make_parent_types, 0, "Type", "");

00748 
00749 /* ************ Make Parent Without Inverse Operator ******************* */
00750 
00751 static int parent_noinv_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00752 {
00753     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00754     Object *par= ED_object_active_context(C);
00755     
00756     par->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
00757     
00758     /* context iterator */
00759     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00760         if (ob != par) {
00761             if (BKE_object_parent_loop_check(par, ob)) {
00762                 BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Loop in parents");
00763             }
00764             else {
00765                 /* clear inverse matrix and also the object location */
00766                 unit_m4(ob->parentinv);
00767                 memset(ob->loc, 0, 3*sizeof(float));
00768                 
00769                 /* set recalc flags */
00770                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA;
00771                 
00772                 /* set parenting type for object - object only... */
00773                 ob->parent= par;
00774                 ob->partype= PAROBJECT; /* note, dna define, not operator property */
00775             }
00776         }
00777     }
00778     CTX_DATA_END;
00779     
00780     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, CTX_data_scene(C));
00781     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00782     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00783     
00784     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00785 }
00786 
00787 void OBJECT_OT_parent_no_inverse_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
00788 {
00789     /* identifiers */
00790     ot->name = "Make Parent without Inverse";
00791     ot->description = "Set the object's parenting without setting the inverse parent correction";
00792     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_parent_no_inverse_set";
00793     
00794     /* api callbacks */
00795     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm;
00796     ot->exec = parent_noinv_set_exec;
00797     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00798     
00799     /* flags */
00800     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00801 }

00803 /************************ Clear Slow Parent Operator *********************/
00804 
00805 static int object_slow_parent_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00806 {
00807     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00808     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00809 
00810     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00811         if (ob->parent) {
00812             if (ob->partype & PARSLOW) {
00813                 ob->partype -= PARSLOW;
00814                 where_is_object(scene, ob);
00815                 ob->partype |= PARSLOW;
00816                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
00817             }
00818         }
00819     }
00820     CTX_DATA_END;
00821 
00822     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00823     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE, scene);
00824     
00825     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00826 }

00884 /* ******************** Clear Track Operator ******************* */
00885 
00886 static EnumPropertyItem prop_clear_track_types[] = {
00887     {0, "CLEAR", 0, "Clear Track", ""},
00888     {1, "CLEAR_KEEP_TRANSFORM", 0, "Clear and Keep Transformation (Clear Track)", ""},
00889     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00890 };
00891 
00892 /* note, poll should check for editable scene */
00893 static int object_track_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00894 {
00895     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00896     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00897     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00898 
00899     if (CTX_data_edit_object(C)) {
00900         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Operation cannot be performed in EditMode");
00901         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00902     }
00903     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00904         bConstraint *con, *pcon;
00905         
00906         /* remove track-object for old track */
00907         ob->track= NULL;
00908         ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00909         
00910         /* also remove all tracking constraints */
00911         for (con= ob->constraints.last; con; con= pcon) {
00912             pcon= con->prev;
00913             if (ELEM3(con->type, CONSTRAINT_TYPE_TRACKTO, CONSTRAINT_TYPE_LOCKTRACK, CONSTRAINT_TYPE_DAMPTRACK))
00914                 remove_constraint(&ob->constraints, con);
00915         }
00916         
00917         if (type == 1)
00918             object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat, TRUE, TRUE);
00919     }
00920     CTX_DATA_END;
00921 
00922     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00923     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00924     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00925 
00926     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00927 }

00947 
00948 /************************** Make Track Operator *****************************/
00949 
00950 static EnumPropertyItem prop_make_track_types[] = {
00951     {1, "DAMPTRACK", 0, "Damped Track Constraint", ""},
00952     {2, "TRACKTO", 0, "Track To Constraint", ""},
00953     {3, "LOCKTRACK", 0, "Lock Track Constraint", ""},
00954     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00955 };
00956 
00957 static int track_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00958 {
00959     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00960     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00961     Object *obact= ED_object_active_context(C); 
00962     
00963     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00964     
00965     if (type == 1) {
00966         bConstraint *con;
00967         bDampTrackConstraint *data;
00968 
00969         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00970             if (ob!=obact) {
00971                 con = add_ob_constraint(ob, "AutoTrack", CONSTRAINT_TYPE_DAMPTRACK);
00972 
00973                 data = con->data;
00974                 data->tar = obact;
00975                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00976                 
00977                 /* Lamp, Camera and Speaker track differently by default */
00978                 if (ob->type == OB_LAMP || ob->type == OB_CAMERA || ob->type == OB_SPEAKER)
00979                     data->trackflag = TRACK_nZ;
00980             }
00981         }
00982         CTX_DATA_END;
00983     }
00984     else if (type == 2) {
00985         bConstraint *con;
00986         bTrackToConstraint *data;
00987 
00988         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00989             if (ob!=obact) {
00990                 con = add_ob_constraint(ob, "AutoTrack", CONSTRAINT_TYPE_TRACKTO);
00991 
00992                 data = con->data;
00993                 data->tar = obact;
00994                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00995                 
00996                 /* Lamp, Camera and Speaker track differently by default */
00997                 if (ob->type == OB_LAMP || ob->type == OB_CAMERA || ob->type == OB_SPEAKER) {
00998                     data->reserved1 = TRACK_nZ;
00999                     data->reserved2 = UP_Y;
01000                 }
01001             }
01002         }
01003         CTX_DATA_END;
01004     }
01005     else if (type == 3) {
01006         bConstraint *con;
01007         bLockTrackConstraint *data;
01008 
01009         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
01010             if (ob!=obact) {
01011                 con = add_ob_constraint(ob, "AutoTrack", CONSTRAINT_TYPE_LOCKTRACK);
01012 
01013                 data = con->data;
01014                 data->tar = obact;
01015                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01016                 
01017                 /* Lamp, Camera and Speaker track differently by default */
01018                 if (ob->type == OB_LAMP || ob->type == OB_CAMERA || ob->type == OB_SPEAKER) {
01019                     data->trackflag = TRACK_nZ;
01020                     data->lockflag = LOCK_Y;
01021                 }
01022             }
01023         }
01024         CTX_DATA_END;
01025     }
01026     
01027     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01028     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01029     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
01030     
01031     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01032 }

01036     /* identifiers */
01037     ot->name = "Make Track";

01039     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_track_set";

01053 
01054 /************************** Move to Layer Operator *****************************/
01055 
01056 static unsigned int move_to_layer_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01057 {
01058     int values[20], a;
01059     unsigned int lay= 0;
01060 
01061     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "layers")) {
01062         /* note: layers are set in bases, library objects work for this */
01063         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_bases) {
01064             lay |= base->lay;
01065         }
01066         CTX_DATA_END;
01067 
01068         for (a=0; a<20; a++)
01069             values[a]= (lay & (1<<a));
01070         
01071         RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "layers", values);
01072     }
01073     else {
01074         RNA_boolean_get_array(op->ptr, "layers", values);
01075 
01076         for (a=0; a<20; a++)
01077             if (values[a])
01078                 lay |= (1 << a);
01079     }
01080 
01081     return lay;
01082 }
01083 
01084 static int move_to_layer_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01085 {
01086     View3D *v3d= CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01087     if (v3d && v3d->localvd) {
01088         return WM_operator_confirm_message(C, op, "Move from localview");
01089     }
01090     else {
01091         move_to_layer_init(C, op);
01092         return WM_operator_props_popup(C, op, event);
01093     }
01094 }
01095 
01096 static int move_to_layer_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01097 {
01098     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01099     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01100     View3D *v3d= CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01101     unsigned int lay, local;
01102     /* int islamp= 0; */ /* UNUSED */
01103     
01104     lay= move_to_layer_init(C, op);
01105     lay &= 0xFFFFFF;
01106 
01107     if (lay==0) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01108     
01109     if (v3d && v3d->localvd) {
01110         /* now we can move out of localview. */
01111         /* note: layers are set in bases, library objects work for this */
01112         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_bases) {
01113             lay= base->lay & ~v3d->lay;
01114             base->lay= lay;
01115             base->object->lay= lay;
01116             base->object->flag &= ~SELECT;
01117             base->flag &= ~SELECT;
01118             /* if (base->object->type==OB_LAMP) islamp= 1; */
01119         }
01120         CTX_DATA_END;
01121     }
01122     else {
01123         /* normal non localview operation */
01124         /* note: layers are set in bases, library objects work for this */
01125         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_bases) {
01126             /* upper byte is used for local view */
01127             local= base->lay & 0xFF000000;  
01128             base->lay= lay + local;
01129             base->object->lay= lay;
01130             /* if (base->object->type==OB_LAMP) islamp= 1; */
01131         }
01132         CTX_DATA_END;
01133     }
01134     
01135     /* warning, active object may be hidden now */
01136     
01137     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, scene);
01138     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_LAYER_CONTENT, scene);
01139 
01140     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
01141 
01142     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01143 }
01144 
01145 void OBJECT_OT_move_to_layer(wmOperatorType *ot)
01146 {
01147     /* identifiers */
01148     ot->name = "Move to Layer";
01149     ot->description = "Move the object to different layers";
01150     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_move_to_layer";
01151     
01152     /* api callbacks */
01153     ot->invoke = move_to_layer_invoke;
01154     ot->exec = move_to_layer_exec;
01155     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01156     
01157     /* flags */
01158     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01159     
01160     /* properties */
01161     RNA_def_boolean_layer_member(ot->srna, "layers", 20, NULL, "Layer", "");
01162 }
01163 
01164 /************************** Link to Scene Operator *****************************/
01165 
01166 #if 0
01167 static void link_to_scene(Main *UNUSED(bmain), unsigned short UNUSED(nr))
01168 {
01169     Scene *sce= (Scene*) BLI_findlink(&bmain->scene, G.curscreen->scenenr-1);
01170     Base *base, *nbase;
01171     
01172     if (sce==0) return;
01173     if (sce->id.lib) return;
01174     
01175     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01176         if (TESTBASE(v3d, base)) {
01177             
01178             nbase= MEM_mallocN( sizeof(Base), "newbase");
01179             *nbase= *base;

01181             id_us_plus((ID *)base->object);
01182         }
01183     }
01184 }
01185 #endif
01186 
01187 static int make_links_scene_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01188 {
01189     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01190     Scene *scene_to= BLI_findlink(&CTX_data_main(C)->scene, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "scene"));
01191 
01192     if (scene_to==NULL) {
01193         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Scene not found");
01194         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01195     }
01196 
01197     if (scene_to == CTX_data_scene(C)) {
01198         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't link objects into the same scene");
01199         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01200     }
01201 
01202     if (scene_to->id.lib) {
01203         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't link objects into a linked scene");
01204         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01205     }
01206 
01207     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_bases)
01208     {
01209         if (!object_in_scene(base->object, scene_to)) {
01210             Base *nbase= MEM_mallocN( sizeof(Base), "newbase");
01211             *nbase= *base;
01212             BLI_addhead( &(scene_to->base), nbase);
01213             id_us_plus((ID *)base->object);
01214         }
01215     }
01216     CTX_DATA_END;
01217 
01218     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01219 
01220     /* one day multiple scenes will be visible, then we should have some update function for them */
01221     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01222 }
01223 
01224 enum {
01225     MAKE_LINKS_OBDATA = 1,
01226     MAKE_LINKS_MATERIALS,
01227     MAKE_LINKS_ANIMDATA,
01228     MAKE_LINKS_DUPLIGROUP,
01229     MAKE_LINKS_MODIFIERS
01230 };
01231 
01232 /* Return 1 if make link data is allow, zero otherwise */
01233 static int allow_make_links_data(int ev, Object *ob, Object *obt)
01234 {
01235     switch(ev) {
01236         case MAKE_LINKS_OBDATA:
01237             if (ob->type == obt->type && ob->type != OB_EMPTY)
01238                 return 1;
01239             break;
01240         case MAKE_LINKS_MATERIALS:
01241             if (OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_MATERIAL(ob->type) &&
01242                 OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_MATERIAL(obt->type))
01243             {
01244                 return 1;
01245             }
01246             break;
01247         case MAKE_LINKS_ANIMDATA:
01248         case MAKE_LINKS_DUPLIGROUP:
01249             return 1;
01250         case MAKE_LINKS_MODIFIERS:
01251             if (ob->type != OB_EMPTY && obt->type != OB_EMPTY)
01252                 return 1;
01253             break;
01254     }
01255     return 0;
01256 }
01257 
01258 static int make_links_data_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01259 {
01260     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01261     int event = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01262     Object *ob;
01263     ID *id;
01264     int a;
01265 
01266     ob= ED_object_active_context(C);
01267 
01268     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, obt, selected_editable_objects) {
01269         if (ob != obt) {
01270             if (allow_make_links_data(event, ob, obt)) {
01271                 switch(event) {
01272                 case MAKE_LINKS_OBDATA: /* obdata */
01273                     id= obt->data;
01274                     id->us--;
01275 
01276                     id= ob->data;
01277                     id_us_plus(id);
01278                     obt->data= id;
01279 
01280                     /* if amount of material indices changed: */
01281                     test_object_materials(obt->data);
01282 
01283                     obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
01284                     break;
01285                 case MAKE_LINKS_MATERIALS:
01286                     /* new approach, using functions from kernel */
01287                     for (a=0; a<ob->totcol; a++) {
01288                         Material *ma= give_current_material(ob, a+1);
01289                         assign_material(obt, ma, a+1);  /* also works with ma==NULL */
01290                     }
01291                     break;
01292                 case MAKE_LINKS_ANIMDATA:
01293                     BKE_copy_animdata_id((ID *)obt, (ID *)ob, FALSE);
01294                     BKE_copy_animdata_id((ID *)obt->data, (ID *)ob->data, FALSE);
01295                     break;
01296                 case MAKE_LINKS_DUPLIGROUP:
01297                     obt->dup_group= ob->dup_group;
01298                     if (obt->dup_group) {
01299                         id_lib_extern(&obt->dup_group->id);
01300                         obt->transflag |= OB_DUPLIGROUP;
01301                     }
01302                     break;
01303                 case MAKE_LINKS_MODIFIERS:
01304                     object_link_modifiers(obt, ob);
01305                     obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01306                     break;
01307                 }
01308             }
01309         }
01310     }
01311     CTX_DATA_END;
01312 
01313     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, CTX_data_scene(C));
01314     
01315     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01316     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, CTX_wm_view3d(C));
01317     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01318 }
01319

01339     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "scene", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Scene", "");
01340     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, RNA_scene_local_itemf);

01349         {MAKE_LINKS_ANIMDATA,   "ANIMATION", 0, "Animation Data", ""},
01350         {MAKE_LINKS_DUPLIGROUP, "DUPLIGROUP", 0, "DupliGroup", ""},

01370 
01371 /**************************** Make Single User ********************************/
01372 
01373 static void single_object_users(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, int flag)    
01374 {
01375     Base *base;
01376     Object *ob, *obn;
01377     
01378     clear_sca_new_poins();  /* sensor/contr/act */
01379 
01380     /* duplicate (must set newid) */
01381     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01382         ob= base->object;
01383         
01384         /* newid may still have some trash from Outliner tree building,
01385          * so clear that first to avoid errors [#26002]
01386          */
01387         ob->id.newid = NULL;
01388         
01389         if ( (base->flag & flag)==flag ) {
01390             if (ob->id.lib==NULL && ob->id.us>1) {
01391                 /* base gets copy of object */
01392                 obn= copy_object(ob);
01393                 base->object= obn;
01394                 ob->id.us--;
01395             }
01396         }
01397     }
01398     
01399     ID_NEW(scene->camera);
01400     if (v3d) ID_NEW(v3d->camera);
01401     
01402     /* object pointers */
01403     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01404         object_relink(base->object);
01405     }
01406 
01407     set_sca_new_poins();
01408 }
01409 
01410 /* not an especially efficient function, only added so the single user
01411  * button can be functional.*/
01412 void ED_object_single_user(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
01413 {
01414     Base *base;
01415 
01416     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01417         if (base->object == ob)  base->flag |=  OB_DONE;
01418         else                    base->flag &= ~OB_DONE;
01419     }
01420 
01421     single_object_users(scene, NULL, OB_DONE);
01422 }
01423 
01424 static void new_id_matar(Material **matar, int totcol)
01425 {
01426     ID *id;
01427     int a;
01428     
01429     for (a=0; a<totcol; a++) {
01430         id= (ID *)matar[a];
01431         if (id && id->lib == NULL) {
01432             if (id->newid) {
01433                 matar[a]= (Material *)id->newid;
01434                 id_us_plus(id->newid);
01435                 id->us--;
01436             }
01437             else if (id->us>1) {
01438                 matar[a]= copy_material(matar[a]);
01439                 id->us--;
01440                 id->newid= (ID *)matar[a];
01441             }
01442         }
01443     }
01444 }
01445 
01446 static void single_obdata_users(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, int flag)
01447 {
01448     Object *ob;
01449     Lamp *la;
01450     Curve *cu;
01451     //Camera *cam;
01452     Base *base;
01453     Mesh *me;
01454     ID *id;
01455     int a;
01456 
01457     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01458         ob= base->object;
01459         if (ob->id.lib==NULL && (base->flag & flag)==flag ) {
01460             id= ob->data;
01461             
01462             if (id && id->us>1 && id->lib==NULL) {
01463                 ob->recalc= OB_RECALC_DATA;
01464                 
01465                 BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(id);
01466                 
01467                 switch(ob->type) {
01468                 case OB_LAMP:
01469                     ob->data= la= copy_lamp(ob->data);
01470                     for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
01471                         if (la->mtex[a]) {
01472                             ID_NEW(la->mtex[a]->object);
01473                         }
01474                     }
01475                     break;
01476                 case OB_CAMERA:
01477                     ob->data= copy_camera(ob->data);
01478                     break;
01479                 case OB_MESH:
01480                     ob->data= copy_mesh(ob->data);
01481                     //me= ob->data;
01482                     //if (me && me->key)
01483                     //  ipo_idnew(me->key->ipo);    /* drivers */
01484                     break;
01485                 case OB_MBALL:
01486                     ob->data= copy_mball(ob->data);
01487                     break;
01488                 case OB_CURVE:
01489                 case OB_SURF:
01490                 case OB_FONT:
01491                     ob->data= cu= copy_curve(ob->data);
01492                     ID_NEW(cu->bevobj);
01493                     ID_NEW(cu->taperobj);
01494                     break;
01495                 case OB_LATTICE:
01496                     ob->data= copy_lattice(ob->data);
01497                     break;
01498                 case OB_ARMATURE:
01499                     ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
01500                     ob->data= copy_armature(ob->data);
01501                     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);
01502                     break;
01503                 case OB_SPEAKER:
01504                     ob->data= copy_speaker(ob->data);
01505                     break;
01506                 default:
01507                     if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
01508                         printf("ERROR %s: can't copy %s\n", __func__, id->name);
01509                     return;
01510                 }
01511                 
01512                 id->us--;
01513                 id->newid= ob->data;
01514                 
01515             }
01516             
01517         }
01518     }
01519     
01520     me= bmain->mesh.first;
01521     while (me) {
01522         ID_NEW(me->texcomesh);
01523         me= me->id.next;
01524     }
01525 }
01526 
01527 static void single_object_action_users(Scene *scene, int flag)
01528 {
01529     Object *ob;
01530     Base *base;
01531     
01532     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01533         ob= base->object;
01534         if (ob->id.lib==NULL && (flag==0 || (base->flag & SELECT)) ) {
01535             ob->recalc= OB_RECALC_DATA;
01536             BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&ob->id);
01537         }
01538     }
01539 }
01540 
01541 static void single_mat_users(Scene *scene, int flag, int do_textures)
01542 {
01543     Object *ob;
01544     Base *base;
01545     Material *ma, *man;
01546     Tex *tex;
01547     int a, b;
01548     
01549     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base= base->next) {
01550         ob= base->object;
01551         if (ob->id.lib==NULL && (flag==0 || (base->flag & SELECT)) ) {
01552     
01553             for (a=1; a<=ob->totcol; a++) {
01554                 ma= give_current_material(ob, a);
01555                 if (ma) {
01556                     /* do not test for LIB_NEW: this functions guaranteed delivers single_users! */
01557                     
01558                     if (ma->id.us>1) {
01559                         man= copy_material(ma);
01560                         BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&man->id);
01561                         
01562                         man->id.us= 0;
01563                         assign_material(ob, man, a);
01564 
01565                         if (do_textures) {
01566                             for (b=0; b<MAX_MTEX; b++) {
01567                                 if (ma->mtex[b] && (tex= ma->mtex[b]->tex)) {
01568                                     if (tex->id.us>1) {
01569                                         tex->id.us--;
01570                                         tex= copy_texture(tex);
01571                                         BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&tex->id);
01572                                         man->mtex[b]->tex= tex;
01573                                     }
01574                                 }
01575                             }
01576                         }
01577                     }
01578                 }
01579             }
01580         }
01581     }
01582 }
01583 
01584 static void do_single_tex_user(Tex **from)
01585 {
01586     Tex *tex, *texn;
01587     
01588     tex= *from;
01589     if (tex==NULL) return;
01590     
01591     if (tex->id.newid) {
01592         *from= (Tex *)tex->id.newid;
01593         id_us_plus(tex->id.newid);
01594         tex->id.us--;
01595     }
01596     else if (tex->id.us>1) {
01597         texn= copy_texture(tex);
01598         BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(&texn->id);
01599         tex->id.newid= (ID *)texn;
01600         tex->id.us--;
01601         *from= texn;
01602     }
01603 }
01604 
01605 static void single_tex_users_expand(Main *bmain)
01606 {
01607     /* only when 'parent' blocks are LIB_NEW */
01608     Material *ma;
01609     Lamp *la;
01610     World *wo;
01611     int b;
01612         
01613     for (ma= bmain->mat.first; ma; ma=ma->id.next) {
01614         if (ma->id.flag & LIB_NEW) {
01615             for (b=0; b<MAX_MTEX; b++) {
01616                 if (ma->mtex[b] && ma->mtex[b]->tex) {
01617                     do_single_tex_user( &(ma->mtex[b]->tex) );
01618                 }
01619             }
01620         }
01621     }
01622 
01623     for (la= bmain->lamp.first; la; la=la->id.next) {
01624         if (la->id.flag & LIB_NEW) {
01625             for (b=0; b<MAX_MTEX; b++) {
01626                 if (la->mtex[b] && la->mtex[b]->tex) {
01627                     do_single_tex_user( &(la->mtex[b]->tex) );
01628                 }
01629             }
01630         }
01631     }
01632 
01633     for (wo= bmain->world.first; wo; wo=wo->id.next) {
01634         if (wo->id.flag & LIB_NEW) {
01635             for (b=0; b<MAX_MTEX; b++) {
01636                 if (wo->mtex[b] && wo->mtex[b]->tex) {
01637                     do_single_tex_user( &(wo->mtex[b]->tex) );
01638                 }
01639             }
01640         }
01641     }
01642 }
01643 
01644 static void single_mat_users_expand(Main *bmain)
01645 {
01646     /* only when 'parent' blocks are LIB_NEW */
01647     Object *ob;
01648     Mesh *me;
01649     Curve *cu;
01650     MetaBall *mb;
01651     Material *ma;
01652     int a;
01653     
01654     for (ob=bmain->object.first; ob; ob=ob->id.next)
01655         if (ob->id.flag & LIB_NEW)
01656             new_id_matar(ob->mat, ob->totcol);
01657 
01658     for (me=bmain->mesh.first; me; me=me->id.next)
01659         if (me->id.flag & LIB_NEW)
01660             new_id_matar(me->mat, me->totcol);
01661 
01662     for (cu=bmain->curve.first; cu; cu=cu->id.next)
01663         if (cu->id.flag & LIB_NEW)
01664             new_id_matar(cu->mat, cu->totcol);
01665 
01666     for (mb=bmain->mball.first; mb; mb=mb->id.next)
01667         if (mb->id.flag & LIB_NEW)
01668             new_id_matar(mb->mat, mb->totcol);
01669 
01670     /* material imats  */
01671     for (ma=bmain->mat.first; ma; ma=ma->id.next)
01672         if (ma->id.flag & LIB_NEW)
01673             for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++)
01674                 if (ma->mtex[a])
01675                     ID_NEW(ma->mtex[a]->object);
01676 }
01677 
01678 /* used for copying scenes */
01679 void ED_object_single_users(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, int full)
01680 {
01681     single_object_users(scene, NULL, 0);
01682 
01683     if (full) {
01684         single_obdata_users(bmain, scene, 0);
01685         single_object_action_users(scene, 0);
01686         single_mat_users_expand(bmain);
01687         single_tex_users_expand(bmain);
01688     }
01689 
01690     clear_id_newpoins();
01691 }
01692 
01693 /******************************* Make Local ***********************************/
01694 
01695 /* helper for below, ma was checked to be not NULL */
01696 static void make_local_makelocalmaterial(Material *ma)
01697 {
01698     AnimData *adt;
01699     int b;
01700     
01701     id_make_local(&ma->id, 0);
01702     
01703     for (b=0; b<MAX_MTEX; b++)
01704         if (ma->mtex[b] && ma->mtex[b]->tex)
01705             id_make_local(&ma->mtex[b]->tex->id, 0);
01706     
01707     adt= BKE_animdata_from_id(&ma->id);
01708     if (adt) BKE_animdata_make_local(adt);
01709 
01710     /* nodetree? XXX */
01711 }
01712 
01713 static int make_local_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01714 {
01715     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01716     AnimData *adt;
01717     ParticleSystem *psys;
01718     Material *ma, ***matarar;
01719     Lamp *la;
01720     ID *id;
01721     int a, b, mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01722     
01723     if (mode==3) {
01724         BKE_library_make_local(bmain, NULL, 0); /* NULL is all libs */
01725         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01726         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01727     }
01728 
01729     clear_id_newpoins();
01730     
01731     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_objects) {
01732         if (ob->id.lib)
01733             id_make_local(&ob->id, 0);
01734     }
01735     CTX_DATA_END;
01736     
01737     /* maybe object pointers */
01738     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_objects) {
01739         if (ob->id.lib==NULL) {
01740             ID_NEW(ob->parent);
01741         }
01742     }
01743     CTX_DATA_END;
01744 
01745     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_objects) {
01746         id= ob->data;
01747             
01748         if (id && mode>1) {
01749             id_make_local(id, 0);
01750             adt= BKE_animdata_from_id(id);
01751             if (adt) BKE_animdata_make_local(adt);
01752             
01753             /* tag indirect data direct */
01754             matarar= (Material ***)give_matarar(ob);
01755             if (matarar) {
01756                 for (a=0; a<ob->totcol; a++) {
01757                     ma= (*matarar)[a];
01758                     if (ma)
01759                         id_lib_extern(&ma->id);
01760                 }
01761             }
01762         }
01763 
01764         for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next)
01765             id_make_local(&psys->part->id, 0);
01766 
01767         adt= BKE_animdata_from_id(&ob->id);
01768         if (adt) BKE_animdata_make_local(adt);
01769     }
01770     CTX_DATA_END;
01771 
01772     if (mode>1) {
01773         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_objects) {
01774             if (ob->type==OB_LAMP) {
01775                 la= ob->data;
01776 
01777                 for (b=0; b<MAX_MTEX; b++)
01778                     if (la->mtex[b] && la->mtex[b]->tex)
01779                         id_make_local(&la->mtex[b]->tex->id, 0);
01780             }
01781             else {
01782                 for (a=0; a<ob->totcol; a++) {
01783                     ma= ob->mat[a];
01784                     if (ma)
01785                         make_local_makelocalmaterial(ma);
01786                 }
01787                 
01788                 matarar= (Material ***)give_matarar(ob);
01789                 if (matarar) {
01790                     for (a=0; a<ob->totcol; a++) {
01791                         ma= (*matarar)[a];
01792                         if (ma)
01793                             make_local_makelocalmaterial(ma);
01794                     }
01795                 }
01796             }
01797         }
01798         CTX_DATA_END;
01799     }
01800 
01801     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01802 
01803     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01804 }
01805 
01806 void OBJECT_OT_make_local(wmOperatorType *ot)
01807 {
01808     static EnumPropertyItem type_items[]= {
01809         {1, "SELECTED_OBJECTS", 0, "Selected Objects", ""},
01810         {2, "SELECTED_OBJECTS_DATA", 0, "Selected Objects and Data", ""},
01811         {3, "ALL", 0, "All", ""},
01812         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01813 
01814     /* identifiers */
01815     ot->name = "Make Local";
01816     ot->description = "Make library linked datablocks local to this file";
01817     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_make_local";
01818     
01819     /* api callbacks */
01820     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
01821     ot->exec = make_local_exec;
01822     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01823     
01824     /* flags */
01825     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01826     
01827     /* properties */
01828     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", type_items, 0, "Type", "");
01829 }
01830 
01831 static int make_single_user_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01832 {
01833     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01834     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01835     View3D *v3d= CTX_wm_view3d(C); /* ok if this is NULL */
01836     int flag= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type"); /* 0==ALL, SELECTED==selected objecs */
01837 
01838     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "object"))
01839         single_object_users(scene, v3d, flag);
01840 
01841     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "obdata"))
01842         single_obdata_users(bmain, scene, flag);
01843 
01844     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "material"))
01845         single_mat_users(scene, flag, RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "texture"));
01846 
01847 #if 0 /* can't do this separate from materials */
01848     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "texture"))
01849         single_mat_users(scene, flag, TRUE);
01850 #endif
01851     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "animation"))
01852         single_object_action_users(scene, flag);
01853 
01854     clear_id_newpoins();
01855 
01856     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
01857     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01858 }
01859 
01860 void OBJECT_OT_make_single_user(wmOperatorType *ot)
01861 {
01862     static EnumPropertyItem type_items[]= {
01863         {SELECT, "SELECTED_OBJECTS", 0, "Selected Objects", ""},
01864         {0, "ALL", 0, "All", ""},
01865         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01866 
01867     /* identifiers */
01868     ot->name = "Make Single User";
01869     ot->description = "Make linked data local to each object";
01870     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_make_single_user";
01871 
01872     /* api callbacks */
01873     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
01874     ot->exec = make_single_user_exec;
01875     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01876 
01877     /* flags */
01878     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01879 
01880     /* properties */
01881     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", type_items, SELECT, "Type", "");
01882 
01883     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "object", 0, "Object", "Make single user objects");
01884     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "obdata", 0, "Object Data", "Make single user object data");
01885     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "material", 0, "Materials", "Make materials local to each datablock");
01886     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "texture", 0, "Textures", "Make textures local to each material");
01887     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "animation", 0, "Object Animation", "Make animation data local to each object");
01888 }
01889 
01890 static int drop_named_material_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01891 {
01892     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01893     Base *base= ED_view3d_give_base_under_cursor(C, event->mval);
01894     Material *ma;
01895     char name[MAX_ID_NAME-2];
01896     
01897     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "name", name);
01898     ma= (Material *)find_id("MA", name);
01899     if (base==NULL || ma==NULL) 
01900         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01901     
01902     assign_material(base->object, ma, 1);
01903     
01904     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
01905     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, CTX_wm_view3d(C));
01906     
01907     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01908 }
01909 
01910 /* used for dropbox */
01911 /* assigns to object under cursor, only first material slot */
01912 void OBJECT_OT_drop_named_material(wmOperatorType *ot)
01913 {
01914 
01915     /* identifiers */
01916     ot->name = "Drop Named Material on Object";
01917     ot->description = "";
01918     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_drop_named_material";
01919     
01920     /* api callbacks */
01921     ot->invoke = drop_named_material_invoke;
01922     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
01923     
01924     /* flags */
01925     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
01926     
01927     /* properties */
01928     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "name", "Material", MAX_ID_NAME-2, "Name", "Material name to assign");
01929 }
